name: Saiibo fangame (HUGE WIP!)
description:
Hello! The script for this game (as in story, not coding, although that's looking pretty rough too) is complete and udder garbage. Please for the love of any and every god only download this for fun, to test it or to mess around with the game's code. Do not critique it.
Script (coding) based off: https://zeillearnings.itch.io/visual-novel-renpy-tutorial
My tumblr: https://whirlingleavesanon.tumblr.com/
The game will be updated throughout every day, but updates will be posted only when there are significant changes or routes to be added.
Edit: There is a glitch in the code when you click the "..." option. Please do not click it. This will be fixed in the next upload.
